Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ Image()

discpp::Image::Image ( std::ifstream *  image,
std::string  location 
)
inline

Constructs a discpp::Image object from the id.

You must supply the location of *file due to us needing to find out the file extension.

discpp::Image image(&file, "test.png");
Parameters
[in]imageThe image.
[in]locationThe image location.
Returns
discpp::Image, this is a constructor.

◆ ToDataURI()

std::string discpp::Image::ToDataURI ( )

Converts the image to the Data URI scheme.

discpp::Image image(&file, "test.txt");
std::string data_uri = image.ToDataURI();
Returns
std::string
